entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
